org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl
Class EH2000

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.AbstractLTLRewriter
      org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.LTLRewriterAdapter
          org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.EH2000
All Implemented Interfaces:
FormulaRewriter, LTLRewriter
public class EH2000
extends LTLRewriterAdapter
implements FormulaRewriter

This class implements the LTL formulae simplification described in [Kousha Etessami, Gerard J. Holzmann: Optimizing Büchi Automata. CONCUR 2000: 153-167]. Note that the paper from Springer has typos. ψ1 U γ in Definition 2 should be ψ1 U ψ2.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
